title.rendered: Say It With Gift Hampers | Your Guide to Gift Hampers

content.rendered:
Gift hampers have become an increasingly popular gift option for people who want to show their love and appreciation to their friends, family, and colleagues. They are a beautiful and unique way of sending love and gratitude to people who matter the most to us. Furthermore gift hampers offer a curated selection of products that are carefully chosen to suit different preferences, personalities, and occasions.

They offer a convenient and personalised solution that can make a lasting impression on the recipient. Additionally, here are some of the reasons why you should consider buying a gift hamper:

Buying A Gift Hamper

CONVENIENT GIFT SOLUTION

Shopping for individual gifts can be time-consuming and sometimes even stressful. But with gift hampers, you can save time and energy by choosing options that are tailored to suit the recipient’s taste and personality.

IMPRESS YOUR RECIPIENT

Gift hampers are often beautifully packaged and presented, making them an excellent way to make a lasting impression on the recipient. The care and thought that go into choosing the perfect hamper will not go unnoticed, and your recipient will appreciate the effort you put into selecting a gift that is just right for them.

AFFORDABLE AND PERSONAL

Gift hampers come in different price points, making them an affordable option for those who want to show their love and appreciation without breaking the bank. Whether it’s a summer-themed hamper for the beach lover in your life or a self-care hamper for someone who deserves a little extra love, you’re sure to find a hamper that fits the bill.

SHOW YOUR THOUGHTFULNESS

Gift hampers demonstrate your consideration for the recipient’s preferences and show that you understand what they might like. Your thoughtfulness will not go unnoticed, and the recipient will appreciate the fact that you took the time to choose a gift that is meaningful and personal to them.

SUITABLE FOR ALL OCCASIONS

Gift hampers are suitable for any occasion, making them an excellent choice for those who want to show their care and affection throughout the year. Whether it’s a birthday, holiday, special occasion, or just because, gift hampers are a sure way to make someone feel loved and appreciated.

Why Not Choose A Gift Hamper

So why not choose a gift hamper that is just right for your special someone? At LULLY & ROSE, we understand the importance of finding the right gift for your loved ones. That’s why we offer a wide selection of gift hampers, each thoughtfully curated to match the recipient’s taste and the occasion. Whether you’re looking for a summer-themed hamper, a self-care hamper, or one specifically for hot chocolate lovers, we’ve got you covered. Let us be your guide in discovering the magic of personalised gift-giving, and finding the ideal hamper to show your love and appreciation to the special someone in your life.

Summer Vibes Gift Hampers

A celebration of life and good vibes, for summer lovers. This Summer Vibes Gift Hamper is a treat for your loved one, a birthday celebration, or a summer holiday.

The hamper includes

  • Mr Consistent Pash Inn Cocktail Mix (750ml)
  • Mr Consistent Cocktail Shaker Kit, to ensure you have the perfect mix
  • Mary Valley Food Co. Dried Orange (70g), grown and handpicked right here in Queensland!
  • 2x Tall Cocktail Glasses, because there’s no fun in drinking alone
  • Loco Love Chocolate ‘Wild Rose Ganache’ Twin Pack, gluten-free, organic & vegan!! Proudly made in Byron Bay, Australia

If you’re looking for a unique and thoughtful gift for someone special, this summer hamper is a great option. Whether you’re sending it as a gift to someone who loves to entertain guests or just to show your appreciation for a loved one, this hamper is sure to put a smile on their face. The thoughtful combination of items, from the stylish cocktail shaker kit to the delicious dried oranges and Loco Love chocolate, makes it a thoughtful and well-rounded gift.

Margarita Hour Gift Hampers

The Margarita Hour Gift Hamper is an excellent way to celebrate accomplishments. A LULLY & ROSE fav ~ Our ‘Margarita Hour’ is a cocktail that everyone knows and loves!

Range of treats includes;

  • Mr Consistent Margarita Cocktail Mix (750ml)
  • Mr Consistent Cocktail Shaker Kit, to ensure you have the perfect mix
  • Mary Valley Food Co. Dried Lime (50g), grown & handpicked right here in Queensland!
  • 2x Cocktail Glasses, to celebrate with those you love
  • Loco Love Chocolate ‘Butter Caramel Pecan’

All are carefully selected to make this hamper special and memorable. Whether it’s a graduation, a promotion, a new home, or any other life milestone, the Margarita Hour Gift Hamper is a great way to raise a glass and celebrate.

The beautifully packaged hamper will be a lasting reminder of the celebration and furthermore will make the recipient feel special and appreciated. The cocktail mix, shaker kit, and dried lime are the perfect ingredients for a celebratory margarita, and the Loco Love chocolate and cocktail glasses add a touch of luxury to the celebration. This hamper is not just a gift, but a celebration of life and good vibes that the recipient will treasure for years to come.

Phally Love Gift Hampers

This Phally Love Gift Hamper is a special and unique way to express your love to someone important in your life.

Hamper includes;

  • Phalaenopsis Orchid Plant arranged in a simplistic, contemporary evergreen glass vase.
  • Georg Jensen Sparkling Wine, a collaboration between renowned designer, Georg Jensen, and winemakers Heemskerk.
  • Loco Love Chocolate ‘Lovers Box’, gluten-free, organic & vegan!! Proudly made in Byron Bay, Australia.

This is not just a stunning visual display but also a symbol of love and beauty. The orchid plant is long-lasting and will provide a lovely reminder of your affection whenever they look at it.

In addition, sparkling wine is a perfect accompaniment to any special occasion or celebration. The wine adds a touch of sophistication and elegance to the hamper, making it an extraordinary gift.

Hello Baby Gift Hampers

Hello Baby Gift Hamper Includes items for both Mum and baby, ensuring that everyone is taken care of during this exciting time.

The hamper features include;

FOR MUM

  • Cleanse & Co. ’New Mumma’ Bath Soak (70g). For Mum to take a little time out for herself. (Ingredients: Calendula, Chamomile & Lavender Flowers, Rosemary & Sage Leaves, Dead Sea Salt, Witch Hazel, Lavender, Chamomile, Sage Essential Oils)
  • Loco Love Chocolate ‘Butter Caramel Pecan’ Twin Pack, gluten-free, organic & vegan!! Proudly made in Byron Bay, Australia

FOR BUB *Perfect for while in hospital, travel or bub’s nappy bag

  • Al.ive Body ‘Baby’ Hair & Body Wash (50ml), infused with pear extract, Jojoba Oil & Calendula
  • Al.ive Body ‘Baby’ Body Lotion (50ml), infused with pear extract, Jojoba Oil & Calendula.
  • Al.ive Body Nappy Cream (80ml), to gently soothe & protect baby’s bottom

Say It With Gift Hampers

Sending this hamper to new parents in your life is a great way to show them your support and care. It’s a reminder that they’re not alone in this new chapter of their lives, and they have people who are thinking of them wishing them all the best.

By selecting our gift hampers to show thoughtful curation for the recipient’s preferences and interests. This gesture of thoughtfulness and consideration is sure to leave a lasting impression.

LULLY & ROSE aims to help customers discover the magic of gift-giving, creating the perfect hamper for their special someone. If you’re looking for the perfect gift hamper for that special someone in your life, visit our gift hamper page.

 

Shop Hampers
